entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 a.m. EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Blizzard. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing early this morning. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near midnight then snow and blowing snow. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
